title: Wilhelm Rothmayer
summary: Wilhelm Rothmayer (born 18 December 1910, date of death unknown) was an Austrian long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1936 Summer Olympics.
content:
Wilhelm Rothmayer (born 18 December 1910, date of death unknown) was an Austrian long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1936 Summer Olympics.
